RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the motion to dismiss the indictment: Ramon De La Cruz's motion to dismiss the indictment

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.ten undocumented aliens: hidden in the tractor-trailer, discovered at immigration checkpoint stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: appellant, convicted of alien transportation offenses and sentenced to 41 months' imprisonment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena and Manuel Hernandez: United States Border Patrol Agents involved in the immigration checkpoint stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.immigration checkpoint stop: location where ten undocumented aliens were discovered hidden in the tractor-trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz's indictment: indictment against Ramon De La Cruz for alien transportation offenses
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz's motion to dismiss the: pretrial motion filed by Ramon De La Cruz, denied by the United States District Court
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Speedy Trial Act: governs the timing of trials, including exclusions for certain periods
